title: How to Remove a Website From the Restricted Site List in Internet Explorer

steps.title: Select "Internet Options" from the drop-down list.
steps.content: Select "Internet Options" from the drop-down list.

steps.title: Find the site that you want unblocked.
steps.content: Find the site that you want unblocked.

steps.title: Note:
steps.content: Note: This method won't work if the "Internet Options" button locked.
